title: Udrink.io Development
description: Developed a web application using my free time during Covid-19 lockdown period. Udrink.io is a website with realtime, multiplayer drinking games built with React.js, Pixi.js and Socket.io. Project was a challenge to develop a full application from early prototyping to production in a short amount of time, and currently has over 150 players a day.

title: Solvay Business Game (selected)
institution: Solvay Brussels School of Economics & Management
description: Among 400 selected participants from over 1300 applicants worldwide in Europe's largest business game. However, due to the Covid-19 situation, the event was unfortunately cancelled.

title: French Teacher
description: Experienced teaching in different cultural environment by being a French teacher for groups of children (8 to 12) and adolescents (12 to 16) in Singapore.

title: Computer Vision Research Project
description: Doing my research project for my Honours Programme at AIIR Innovations, a startup company that develops software that automates borescope inspections of jet engines. As Computer Vision was not offered in my bachelors programme I used this opportunity to get exposed to the field.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Teaching Assistant for Object-Oriented Programming, Reasoning and Logic, Algorithms and Data Structures, Calculus, and OOP Project. Developed extensive knowledge in these subjects and valuable teaching skills.

title: DSA StartApp Development
description: Developed an Android app for a flying student association I was former member of. The app is responsible for keeping track of flights, data validation, syncing with the server, having a local backup for offline capabilities, providing summaries to the board through email, all provided within an intuitive user interface for the everyday user to use.
